title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Whisk eggs and Parmesan together in a bowl.
Drain pasta, then mix with pancetta and egg mixture.
Season with black pepper and serve.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a creamy tomato-based sauce.
instructions: Marinate chicken in tikka paste for at least 1 hour.
Sauté onion, then add tomato puree and cream.
Add grilled chicken to the sauce and simmer.
Serve hot with rice or naan.

title: Margherita Pizza
summary: Classic Italian pizza topped with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil.
instructions: Spread tomato slices evenly over dough.
Add mozzarella and drizzle with olive oil.
Bake for 10-12 minutes until crust is golden.
Garnish with fresh basil before serving.
